entries.journal_entry_description: Your second attempt to show Benjamin, the Disillusioned Ewok Festival of love Sage, that love still exists even in a galaxy at war.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Okay, we need a more substantial instance of love. Luckily, I know just the thing. A young man I know is deeply in love and needs some help in expressing it. Go speak with him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: A Message from Mr. Love: "Okay, we need a more substantial instance of love. Luckily, I know just the thing. A young man I know is deeply in love and needs some help in expressing it. Go speak with him."
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Mr. Love suggests speaking with Jonathan Squire, a young man who requires some help in expressing his love to the object of his desire.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Speak with the Love Struck Young Man
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Jonathan Squire is attempting to write a love letter to the woman with whom he is in love. Help him find the words he needs to complet his letter.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Benjamin, the Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage, and relate to him the lengths to which love will still go in the galaxy.
entries.task03_waypoint_name: The Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Well done. Jonathan is sure to find his love returned twofold. Return to Benjamin and relate to him the lengths to which love will still go in the galaxy.
entries.task06_start_message: You fire a single crossbow bolt into the air.
